title: DDoS Mitigation
description: The FlowControl system in the XND module supports two features to mitigate DDoS attacks: FlowSpec and RTBH (Remotely Triggered Black Hole). Both require routers that support BGP protocol and optionally FlowSpec feature. When FlowControl detects an attack, it sends a command to the edge router(s) of the organization to block the offending traffic. Depending on the feature used, this command can be a filtering rule to place in an internal FlowSpec table or regular route to inject in the routing table.
